input.sentences: the gallery had many lovely paintings .
some likened the art to that of picasso .
there were many different art forms including cardboard cutouts that looked magnificent .

output.sentences: The paintings were lovely in the gallery.
The art was likened to Picasso.
The art, including the mirror, looked magnificent.
There were murals on the walls.
We could see the display in the gallery from the window.
